name: The Great Outback
description:
Links to contributors pages: 

Justin Williams: https://soundcloud.com/oregonaddict

Evan Dawson-Greer: https://itch.io/profile/geistder

Zach Carter: https://zcarter.itch.io/

Controls:

Left and Right: A & D

Jump: Spacebar

Throw Boomerang: Right Control

Pause: Escape

This game was created by me and two of my friends as a submission to VimJam: Collectables (8 Bits to Infinity). Art and programming were done by Zach Carter and Evan Dawson-Greer. The music and sound design was done by Justin Williams.

The objective of the game is to explore the level and collect the Wood Key, Gold Key and Bone Key and bring them back to the final door. 

Constructive feedback is highly encouraged! This is our first game jam submission as a team so we know there are things we can improve on but we had a lot of fun and are looking forward to coming back to this and making improvements. 

If you play and rate my game and even leave a comment, I will be sure to play yours!
